data.text:
E2E test: Missing data-testid="game-id" selector

The lobby test "creates game with CPUs" fails because the game-id element is not found.
Tests expect `[data-testid="game-id"]` to exist after game creation.

Suspects: Lobby.tsx or Game.tsx - the component that displays game ID after creation
Path to trace: Check where game ID is displayed in UI and add the data-testid attribute
